Episodes.Title: Find Your Happy Place
Episodes.Plot: In the season two premiere, detectives Charlie Crews and Dani Reese are on the hunt for a serial killer when three numbered trunks containing suffocated bodies are found scattered across Los Angeles. With their new boss New York transfer Captain Kevin Tidwell pressuring them to get answers, Crews and Reese race to find a connection between the murders before the killer strikes again. Meanwhile, Ted and Crews attempt to track down the daughter, the lone survivor, of the family Crews was wrongly c
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jessy Schram, Titus Welliver, Victor Rivers, Anya Monzikova, Kim Director, Noel Fisher, Roberto Sanchez

Episodes.Title: Everything... All the Time
Episodes.Plot: Charlie Crews and Dani Reese investigate the death of a family man who is found beaten and bound to a chair at the bottom of an empty pool. Captain Tidwell is convinced the murder was an act of gang violence and sends the detectives on assignment. After interviewing the victim?s daughters and two gang members, Crews and Reese?s only clues are an underground party circuit, a bottle of steroids, and a myth about a man only known as Monster. Meanwhile, Ted gets an unexpected visit from Dani?s fathe

Episodes.Title: The Business of Miracles
Episodes.Plot: Crews and Reese are baffled when the body of a cancer research scientist is found frozen solid; Crews resolves to prove that Jack Reese was involved in his incarceration; Ted asks Crews to be a reference for a business school interview.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Not for Nothing
Episodes.Plot: Crews and Reese race against the clock to find the killer when a student acting as a corrections officer in a university's prison experiment ends up dead; Crews obsesses over a recording he got from a wiretap he placed on Reese.

Episodes.Title: Crushed
Episodes.Plot: When a college student is found crushed to death in a wrecking yard, the probe leads Crews and Reese to a complex online love triangle; Crews continues his investigation into Jack Reese by hunting for the officers seen in his latest clue.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sheila Shaw, Gloria Garayua, Alex Sol, Jonathan Banks, Jennifer Jalene, Maeve Quinlan, Kelly Stables, Kate Lang Johnson, John Crawford, Paul Messinger, Tyson Turrou, Michael Crider, Anna Zielinski, Abby Cooper, Deb

Episodes.Title: Did You Feel That?
Episodes.Plot: Crews and Reese must track down a killer who escaped from prison after an earthquake hit Los Angeles.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Canaan, Tahmus Rounds, Brett Wagner, Joshua Alba, Maxwell Glick, Chris Riddell, Jennifer Birmingham, Emma Degerstedt, Daniel Polo, Jon Sklaroff, Michael Cudlitz, Stacey Travis, Rebecca Lowman, Michael Clin

Episodes.Title: Jackpot
Episodes.Plot: A woman is found in a pool of blood sitting at a table set with a romantic dinner for two; Rachel and Crews realize they share a common bond.
Episodes.GuestStars: Brandon Brocato, Connor Merkovich, Vince Green, Mike Randleman, Amy Kathleen Murray, Paul Raci, Matt Borlenghi, Jonathan Slavin, Eugene Byrd, Stephen Bogardus, Erik Estrada

Episodes.Title: Black Friday
Episodes.Plot: Crews and Reese must track down the body of a murder victim and a killer when a murder takes place in one of the largest malls in America on one of the biggest shopping days of the year.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kyle Gallner, William Atherton, Shashawnee Hall, Brianne Davis, Steven Crowley, Mary Matilyn Mouser, Bonnie Hellman, Kai Schmoll, Bill Lee Brown, Monica Lee, Emily Rae Argenti, Marcus Giamatti, James Mitchel Clyd

Episodes.Title: Badge Bunny
Episodes.Plot: Crews and Reese discover that a dead elementary teacher was a woman who exclusively dated cops, and that the killer could be one of their own; Crews and Jennifer address their complex relationship.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence, drug references & sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Jennifer Jalene, Joel Stoffer, Marvin Jordan, Bradley Snedeker, Matt Nolan, Mitchell Fink, Aja Evans, Jamie Harris, Victoria Pratt, Alex Carter, Brea Cola, Tyler Kain, Chelsea MacDougall, William Atherton

Episodes.Title: Evil... and his Brother Ziggy
Episodes.Plot:
When a sheriff?s deputy is found murdered on an Indian reservation, Crews and Reese find themselves in the middle of a turf war between Tribal police and the county sheriff?s department. The detectives learn the victim was not well-liked on the reservation and the opening of a new profitable casino may have led to the deputy?s demise. 

Crews attends a fundraiser thrown by Mickey Rayborn, one of the individuals Crews believes was involved in the conspiracy against him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ted Mattison, Mandell Maughan, Rick Cramer, Peter D. Greene, Diane Mercer, Andre Johnson, William Atherton, Timilee Romolini, Malaya Rivera Drew, Sal Lopez, Clayne Crawford, Zahn McLarnon, Leandro Cano

Episodes.Title: Canyon Flowers
Episodes.Plot:
A food bank delivery man is found buried up to his neck in a backyard.

Crews disregards the FBI's warning and confronts Mickey Rayborn about his role in the conspiracy that put Crews in jail.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andre Johnson, Jessica Dunphy, Marshall Allman, Mary Gross, Tim de Zarn, Michael Raymond-James, Rachel Miner, Troy Bishop, Michael J. Silver, Moira Squier, Mark Weiler, Joseph Kim, William Atherton, Craig Tsuyumin

Episodes.Title: Trapdoor
Episodes.Plot: Crews's father, Charles Crews, Sr., shows up at his son's doorstep to try to mend fences. Crews and Reese investigate the death of three Russians;  Reese falls into old habits.
Episodes.GuestStars: Geoffrey Pierson, Tessa Thompson, Garret Dillahunt, Jon Sklaroff, Ondrej Habinak, Aria Pullman, Ed Corbin, Kevin Indio Copeland, David Ury, Edin Gali

Episodes.Title: Re-Entry
Episodes.Plot: Charlie Crews and Dani Reese try to narrow down the list of suspects when a retired NASA pilot is shot mid-flight; Crews tries to remember who shot him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kayren Butler, Josh Randall, Richard Speight Jr., Alisha Snider, John Brantley Cole Jr., J.R. Nutt, Rajni Kareer, Jesse Bean, Kevin Indio Copeland, David Ury, Ed Corbin, J. Patrick McCormack

Episodes.Title: Mirror Ball
Episodes.Plot: A lead singer of a heavy metal cover band is suffocated to death; Crews discovers that his father's wedding has been called off.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jim Cody Williams, Rick D. Wasserman, Angela Goethals, Patrick Fabian, Kate Connor, Jelly Howie

Episodes.Title: I Heart Mom
Episodes.Plot: A con-man is found dead with his mouth full of money in a house without a roof; Crews has a confrontation that sheds some light on the conspiracy against him.
Episodes.GuestStars: William Atherton, Charlotte Rae, M.C. Gainey, Dave Florek, Wayne Pére, Helen McCrory, Tamara Feldman, Ian Reed Kesler, Amanda Fuller, Jeremiah Hu, Shawn Ryan

Episodes.Title: Hit Me Baby
Episodes.Plot: Reese receives an offer to join an FBI organized crime task force, leaving Crews and Stark to partner up. The former partners work on a case of a philandering financial adviser who was murdered and discover a case of corporate and political corruption.

Episodes.Title: Shelf Life
Episodes.Plot: Crews and Stark experience the world of extreme corporate power while investigating the stabbing death of a soldier killed while on leave in Los Angeles.
Episodes.Writer: Marjorie David, Wendolyn Calhoun, Melissa Scrivner

Episodes.Title: 3 Women
Episodes.Plot: Jane Seever (Gabrielle Union) is assigned as Crews' new partner while Reese is away. Seever and Crews investigate when a court reporter is clubbed to death.
Episodes.GuestStars: Gabrielle Union, Jason Beghe, Julie Remala, Michael Rose, Larry Clark, Maurice Compte, Michele Hicks

Episodes.Title: 5 Quarts
Episodes.Plot: A co-worker is suspected of murder when Crews and Seever investigate the death of a coroner. They must work fast to find out if the coroner is guilty, or there will be a chance that future cases would become compromised. Elsewhere, Ted tries to work things out with his daughter.
Episodes.GuestStars: Linda Park, Ian Gomez, Gena Shaw, Chane't Johnson, Shashawnee Hall, Josh Novak, Coleen Porch

Episodes.Title: Initiative 38
Episodes.Plot: The detectives look into a politician's murder. The victim had been working on a banning of handguns which would cost gun companies millions of dollars. Elsewhere, Crews looks into the new FBI duties of Reese.

Episodes.Title: One
Episodes.Plot: Crews looking for Reese, who disappeared while on a case with the FBI. What he discovers is that his partners disappearance is connected to the conspiracy that had put Crews in jail.
